title: Crime Alert 08.16.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 08.16.18
description:
It's up to the jury now in the Paul Manafort case. Will mental incompetency claim keep Waffle House shooter out of prison? She admits to pulling the plug on his kayak, but still gets part of his life insurance. Family is outraged.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
